documentation: A corelet that provides the capability to upload a folder’s contents into a user’s locker.

functions.documentation: Displays a dialog box that allows user to select a folder on the local system.
functions.name: ShowBrowseDialog

functions.documentation: Uploads all mp3 files in the folder provided.
functions.name: UploadFolder

parameters.documentation: The path to upload mp3 files from.
parameters.name: path

functions.documentation: Returns the server name to the current locker service.
functions.name: GetLockerService

functions.documentation: Changes the name of the locker service.
functions.name: SetLockerService

parameters.documentation: The value of the locker service to set active.
parameters.name: LockerService

functions.documentation: Downloads locker files to the suggested folder.
functions.name: DownloadFile

parameters.documentation: The origin path of the locker file.
parameters.name: path

parameters.documentation: The Window destination path of the locker file.
parameters.name: destination

name: LockerUploader
